recipesJson.name: Simple Grapple
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: The grapple is an odd combination of an apple that tastes like a grape. Don't know if you've ever had one but here it is in Vape forum.

reviews.text: This is a very accurate flavor.  I've had grapples a few times, and this simple recipe is perfect emulation of that "real apple, fake grape" flavor.  I'm torn on the flavor itself - I'm actually not a big fan of grapples, but it's exactly what I expected when I mixed it, and it did not disappoint.
